com.drfl.twinstickshooter.controller

Class TSSController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.drfl.twinstickshooter.controller.TSSController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.ContactListener

    public class TSSController
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.ContactListener
    MVC Controller, handles Box2D physics for the whole game.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static TSSController getInstance()
        Returns a singleton instance of controller, instance must be initiated by a call to initInstance beforehand. Null is returned if not.
        Returns:
        The singleton instance

      • initInstance

        public static TSSController initInstance(TSSGame game)
        Initializes a controller instance, associating it with a game.
        Parameters:
        game - The game associated with this controller
        Returns:
        The singleton instance

      • createTileEntities

        public void createTileEntities(com.badlogic.gdx.maps.MapLayer collisionLayer)
        Creates tile entities from a collision map layer loaded from a Tiled map.
        Parameters:
        collisionLayer - The collision layer of the Tiled map

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Calculates the next physics step of duration delta (in seconds).
        Parameters:
        delta - The size of this physics step in seconds

      • shoot

        public void shoot(EntityModel owner,
                  com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 direction)
        Shoots a bullet by creating its model and body with specified direction and owner.
        Parameters:
        owner - The entity who owns the bullet
        direction - The direction vector of the bullet

      • beginContact

        public void beginContact(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Contact contact)
        Called when two fixtures begin to touch. Handles specific collision resolution.
        Specified by:
        beginContact in interface com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.ContactListener
        Parameters:
        contact - Contact between two shapes

      • removeFlaggedBullets

        public void removeFlaggedBullets()
        Removes bullet entities flagged for removal by destroying their Box2D body and removing them from the model.

      • removeDead

        public com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<java.lang.Integer> removeDead()
        Removes entities whose HP is <= 0. For main char sets dead flag, for enemies removes them from model and destroys Box2D body.

      • getWorld

        public com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World getWorld()
        Returns:
        The world controlled by this controller

      • isSpawned

        public boolean isSpawned()
        Returns:
        Enemy spawn flag and resets it

        Returns:
        Enemy spawn max cooldown in seconds
